kw.name: Test Api Challenge
kw.doc: 1. Do a GET request to the /users endpoint 2. Validate the response code to be 200 3. Validate the response is an array of json objects 4. Write a file named "target_companies.txt" which contains the company names ends with " Group" from the response

kw.name: Get All Available Pets From Swagger
Send Pet Name In Uppercase
Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Validate Json Data Is An Array
Find And Write Company Name From Response
Send Pet Name In Uppercase And Assert
